text: Basu Chatterjee (; 10 January 1930 - 4 June 2020) was an Indian movie director and screenwriter. His works were known for the urban settings, focusing on marriage and love relationships. He was best known for his movies Us Paar, Chhoti Si Baat (1975), Chitchor (1976), Rajnigandha (1974), Piya Ka Ghar (1972), Khatta Meetha , Chakravyuha, Baton Baton Mein (1979), Priyatama (1977), Man Pasand, Hamari Bahu Alka, Shaukeen (1982), and Chameli Ki Shaadi (1986). ==References== ==Other websites== * * Official website Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Indian screenwriters Category:Indian movie directors
